title: Locator maps for Met Police BCUs

yaml.title: Locator maps for Met Police BCUs
yaml.author: Matt Ashby

markdown.markdown:
I needed to make maps showing the locations of the various Basic Command Units in the Metropolitan Police Service in London. I didn't have anywhere specific to put these, but they might conceivably be useful for other people, so I've put the maps below. The [code to make these maps is on Gist](https://gist.github.com/mpjashby/7485de3f8fc0565abf0dfec61b025550).

Feel free to use these maps in any projects -- see the bottom of the page for a link to the Creative Commons Attribution licence.



![Locator map for the Met Police Central East BCU](https://i.imgur.com/zaHdruH.png)


### Central North

![Locator map for the Met Police Central North BCU](https://i.imgur.com/Cn1OYrw.png)


### Central South

![Locator map for the Met Police Central South BCU](https://i.imgur.com/3WTVnMy.png)


### Central West

![Locator map for the Met Police Central West BCU](https://i.imgur.com/NlvIUfW.png)


### East Area

![Locator map for the Met Police East Area BCU](https://i.imgur.com/4738GOW.png)


### North Area

![Locator map for the Met Police North Area BCU](https://i.imgur.com/eI5LK7d.png)


### North East

![Locator map for the Met Police North East BCU](https://i.imgur.com/yKtkK52.png)


### North West

![Locator map for the Met Police North West BCU](https://i.imgur.com/LwIJCCh.png)


### South Area

![Locator map for the Met Police South Area BCU](https://i.imgur.com/JJ2hhYH.png)


### South East

![Locator map for the Met Police South East BCU](https://i.imgur.com/ptTVfCk.png)


### South West

![Locator map for the Met Police South West BCU](https://i.imgur.com/qrx7Xtf.png)


### West Area

![Locator map for the Met Police West Area BCU](https://i.imgur.com/F5PB7QU.png)
